pages.text: The leaders of those who considered themselves great form among his people said, "We will definitely send you out form our city, O Shuaib, and (also) those who believe with you or else you should return to our religious dictates." He said, " Even though we dislike it

We would forge a lie against God, if we return to your religious dictates after God has delivered us from it. And it is not for us to return to it unless God our Lord wills. Our Lord's knowledge extends over everything, we trust in God. Our Lord ! decide between us and our people with truth and You are the Best of judges
And the leaders of those who did not believe from among his people said, "If you follow Shuaib then you will certainly be losers
So the earthquake took hold of them, thus they became motionless in their houses
Those who denied Shuaib became as though they had not lived therein, who denied Shuaib, they were the losers
So he turned away from them and said, "O my people ! I had conveyed to you the messages of my Lord and given you good advice, then how should I feel sorry for a people who reject
And We did not send a (single) prophet to any city but We seized its people with distress and harm that they may humble themselves

Then We changed the evil for good, until (the good became) surplus and they said, "(Such) harm and happiness did afflict our forefathers (too)," then We seized them suddenly while they did not perceive
